data.name: DeletePaymentRequest#1
data.value: update CKT_DISB_TRAN set PRQ_GENERATED_ID = null where PRQ_GENERATED_ID = @prqGeneratedId

data.name: DeletePaymentRequest#2
data.value: select top(1) 1 from CKT_ELEC_FUND_TRAN where PRQ_GENERATED_ID = @prqGeneratedId

data.name: DeletePaymentRequest#3
data.value: update CKT_OBLIGATION set PRQ_ID = null where PRQ_ID = @prqGeneratedId

data.name: DeletePaymentRequest#4
data.value: update CKT_PMNT_REQUEST set PRQ_R_GENERATED_ID = null where PRQ_R_GENERATED_ID = @prqGeneratedId

data.name: DeletePaymentRequest#5
data.value: select top(1) 1 from CKT_POT_RECOVERY where PRQ_IDENTIFIER = @prqGeneratedId

data.name: DeletePaymentStatusHistory
data.value: delete from CKT_PMNT_STAT_HIST where (PST_GENERATED_ID = @pstGeneratedId) and (PRQ_GENERATED_ID = @prqGeneratedId) and (PYMNT_STAT_HIST_ID = @pymntStatHistId)

data.name: DeleteReceiptRefund#1
data.value: update CKT_DISB_TRAN T3 set T3.PRQ_GENERATED_ID = null where exists ( select top(1) 1 from CKT_PMNT_REQUEST T2 where (T2.PAYMENT_REQUEST_ID = T3.PRQ_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.RCT_R_TSTAMP = @rctRTstamp) )

data.name: DeleteReceiptRefund#2
data.value: select top(1) 1 from CKT_PMNT_REQUEST T2 join CKT_ELEC_FUND_TRAN T3 on (T2.PAYMENT_REQUEST_ID = T3.PRQ_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.RCT_R_TSTAMP = @rctRTstamp)

data.name: DeleteReceiptRefund#3
data.value: update CKT_OBLIGATION T3 set T3.PRQ_ID = null where exists ( select top(1) 1 from CKT_PMNT_REQUEST T2 where (T2.PAYMENT_REQUEST_ID = T3.PRQ_ID) and (T2.RCT_R_TSTAMP = @rctRTstamp) )

data.name: DeleteReceiptRefund#4
data.value: update CKT_PMNT_REQUEST T3 set T3.PRQ_R_GENERATED_ID = null where exists ( select top(1) 1 from CKT_PMNT_REQUEST T2 where (T2.PAYMENT_REQUEST_ID = T3.PRQ_R_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.RCT_R_TSTAMP = @rctRTstamp) )

data.name: DeleteReceiptRefund#5
data.value: select top(1) 1 from CKT_PMNT_REQUEST T2 join CKT_POT_RECOVERY T3 on (T2.PAYMENT_REQUEST_ID = T3.PRQ_IDENTIFIER) and (T2.RCT_R_TSTAMP = @rctRTstamp)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetail
data.value: select top(1) CRV_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CRD_ID from CKT_CR_DETAIL where (CRD_ID = @crdId) and (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier)

data.name: ReadPaymentRequest
data.value: select top(1) PAYMENT_REQUEST_ID, NUMBER, PRINT_DATE, TYPE, RCT_R_TSTAMP, PRQ_R_GENERATED_ID from CKT_PMNT_REQUEST where @rctRTstamp = RCT_R_TSTAMP

data.name: ReadPaymentStatusHistory
data.value: select top(1) PST_GENERATED_ID, PRQ_GENERATED_ID, PYMNT_STAT_HIST_ID, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_PMNT_STAT_HIST where (@prqGeneratedId = PRQ_GENERATED_ID) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE > @discontinueDate)

data.name: ReadReceiptRefund
data.value: select top(1) CREATED_TIMESTAMP, REASON_CODE, TAXID, PAYEE_NAME, AMOUNT, OFFSET_TAX_YEAR, REQUEST_DATE, CREATED_BY, CRV_IDENTIFIER, CRD_IDENTIFIER, REASON_TEXT, CRT_IDENTIFIER, CST_IDENTIFIER from CKT_RECEIPT_REFUND where CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp
